message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500.  It's in great condition and worth a lot to the right buyer. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,500.  This still leaves some room for both of us to be happy with the transaction. Let's make this happen!
